275a5('bum): gyi rkang pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// dbang po lnga sgrub pa'o// stobs lnga sgrub pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgrub pa'o// 'phag sa pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgrub pa'o// 'phags pa'i
275a6('bum): bden pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad sgrub pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu sgrub pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo steng pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / spen pa med pa
275a7('bum): sgrub pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams sgrub pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams sgrub pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrub pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgrub pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// sa se
275a8('bum): yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgrub pa'o// byams pa chen po sgrub pa'o// snying rje chen po sgrub pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgrub pa'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgru
275b1('bum): pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgrub pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid sgrub pa'o// rang byang chub sgrub pa'o// thams cad shes pa nyid sgrub pa'o// lam gyi rna ba sreb cing sgrub pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
275b2('bum): sgrub pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs dag pa dang / tsher ba dag pa dang / 'du shes dag pa dang / 'du byed dag
275b3('bum): pi dang / rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / mig dag pa dang / rna ba dag pa dang / sna dag pa dang / lce dag pa dang / lus dag pa dang / yid dag pa dang / gzugs dag pa dang / sgra dag pa dang / dri dag pa dang / 
275b4('bum): ro dag pa dang / reg dag pa dang / chos dag pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / lce'i rnam
275b5('bum): par shes pa dag pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te/ reg pa dag pa drang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / sna'i
275b6('bum): 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dag pa dang / yid kyi 'das te reg pa dag pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag pa dang / rna
275b7('bum): nga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag pa dang / snga'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba dag pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dag pa dang / lus kyi 'dus de reg pa'i rkyen gyis cher
275b8('bum): dag pa dang / yid kyi 'das te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba dag pa dang / sa'i khams dag pa dang / chu'i khams dag pa dang / me'i khams dag pa dang / rlung gi khams dag pa dang nam mkha'i khams dag pa dang
276a1('bum): rnam par shes pa'i khams dag pa dang / ma rig pa dag pa dang / 'du byed dag pa dang / rnam par shes pa dag pa dang / ming dang gzugs dag pa dang / skyer ched drag dag pa dang / reg pa dag
276a2('bum): nga dang / tsher ba dag pa dang / sred pa dag pa dang / len pa dag pa dang / srid pa dag pa dang / skye ba dag pa dang / rga shi dag pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa
276a3('bum): dang / bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag pa dang / nang steng pa
276a4('bum): nyid dag pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid dag pa dang / phyi nang steng pa nyid dag pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / chen po steng pa nyid dag pa dang / der dang pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / 
276a5('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid dag pa dang / 'das ma byas stong pa nyid dag pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / theg ma dang tha ma med pa steng pa nyid dag pa dang / der ba med
276a6('bum): pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / rang bzhin steng pa nyid dag pa dang / ches thams cad stong pa nyid dag pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dngos po med
276a7('bum): pa steng pa nyid dag pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dag pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dag pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
276a8('bum): dag pa dang / dbang po dag pa dang / stebs dag pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dag pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dag dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dag pa dang / bsam gtan dag pa dang
276b1('bum): tshad med pa dag pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dag pa dang / rnam par thar pa dag pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa dgu dag pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i skye steng pa nyid dang
276b2('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dag pa dang / mngon par shes pa dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dag pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo dag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dag pa dang / mi 'jigs pa
276b3('bum): bani dag pa dang / se so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dag pa dang / byams pa chen po dag pa dang / snying rje chen po dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid
276b4('bum): dag pa dang / lam gyi rnar pa shes pa nyid dag pa dang / rnam pa tham sa cad mkhyen pa nyid dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dag pa'i phung ngo'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab
276b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me de lta bu bstan pa'i tshe/ bar chad mang du 'byung ba ni nge mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis ba ka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor shes ra
276b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bar chad mang po 'byung ste/ de lta bas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bums/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin zab me 'di 'bri ba dang / klag pa dang / bstan pa dang
276b7('bum): tshul bzhin du yang la bya ba dang / bsgom par bya ba la bar chad du mi 'gyur bar 'bri na'ang myur du bri bar bya'o// klag pa'ang myur du klag gi/ bstan na'ang myur du bstan to// tshul bzhin du yid la byan
276b8('bum): 'di myur du tshu la bzhin du yid la bya'o// bsgom na'ang myur du bsgom par bya'o// rab 'byor de lta bas na/ gal te rigs kyi bu 'tshe/ rigs kyi bu mes/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba zab mi 'di/ zla ba
277a1('bum): gcig gis bri bar byas na yang / des de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// gal te zla ba gnyis sam/ gal te zla ba gsu 'am/ gal te zla ba bzhi'ang// gal te zla ba lnga 'am/ gal te rje drug
277a2('bum): gar/ gal te le'i bar gyis bri bar byas na yang / de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// gal te zla ba gcig gis bstan pa dang / lung dbab pa dang / kha zen du bya ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / bsgo par byas
277a3('bum): yang de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o// gal te le'i bar gyis bsgom par byas na yang / de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ro/ ner bu rin po che rer be la bar rang ra dang 'byung ngo / 
277a4('bum): gsel ba/ bcor ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha na pa zab mo 'di/ ji nas kyang ri bri ba dang / mi klag pa dang / mi bstan pa dang / kha den mi bgyi ba dang / yid la mi bgye ba dang / 
277a5('bum): mi bsgrer pa'i slad du/ bdud sdig te can dag par chang ri bgyi ba ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa/ rab 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin zang me 'di la
277a6('bum): ji nas kyang mi 'bri ba dang / mi klog pa dang / mi bstan pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya ba dang / mi bsgom pa'i phyir bdud sdig te can bar chad mi byed pa'ang ma yin med kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sem
277a7('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ zang me 'di 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton de da pa dang / bsgom pa rnams la bar chad bya bar mi nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan
277a8('bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das ji'i mthus na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo 'di/ 'bri ba dang / klag pa dang / kha ten du bgyi
277b1('bum): ba dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyi ba dang / bsgom pa la bdud sdig te can bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ byang chub sems
277b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di 'bri ba dang / klag pa dang / kha ten du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa dag la bdud sdig te can gyis bar chad
277b3('bum): bya bar mi nus so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'di skyeng ba dang / ches ston pa de dag gi mthus kyang
277b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po 'di 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / sten pa dang / kha tan du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du
277b5('bum): yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa de dag la bdud sdig te can gyis bar chad bya bar mi nus so// sangs rgyas btsem ldan 'das de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
277b6('bum): dpa' chen po de dag la dgongs shing yongs su 'dzin pa mdzad de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis yongs su bzung ba'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
277b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa zab po 'di 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / ster pa dang / kha ten byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsko pa de dag la bdud sdig te car gyis bar chad bya bar mi nus so/ 
277b8('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i nges yongs su btsal ba la bad sdig te can gyis bar rang bya
278a1('bum): par ri nus se// shA ra da ti'i bu de ri gang de ltar phyogs bcu kur gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dad med pa grangs med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
278a2('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba dang / ches sten pa de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di 'bri ba la/ dgengs
278a3('bum): par dzad pa dang / klog cing sten pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa la dgengs pa mdzad pa ni ches nyid kyis de bzhin te/ shA ra da ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
278a4('bum): rigs kyi bu mes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di' bri zhing klog pa dang / sten cing tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / bsgom pa des kyang bdag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus
278a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'bri'o// klog go/ ste na te// kha ton du byed de// tshul bzhin du yid la byed do// sgom me zhes bya bar khong du chud par bya'o// gsel ba/ bcom
278a6('bum): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su yang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / sten pa dang / kha ten du bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
278a7('bum): bgyid po dang / sgom me 'tshal kun kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu lags/ kun kyang sangs rgyas kyis bzungs lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te// de de bzhi
278a8('bum): ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang su'ang rung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di 'dri zhing klog pa dang / sten cing kha ten du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la
278b1('bum): bre cing skem pa de dag thams cad kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu yin par rig par bya'o// de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi gzungs yin par rig par bya'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das rigs
278b2('bum): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di/ 'bri zhing klog pa dang / ston cing kha ton du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid cing / sgor pa de dag ni/ shar pogs
278b3('bum): nas phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad dang grangs ma mchis pa bzhugs shing / 'tshe skyong ba dang / ches sten pa de dag gis
278b4('bum): mkhyen te gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'bri zhing klog pa dang / ston cing kha ton du bgyid pa dang / tshul ba zhin du yid la bgyid cing bskam pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcer
278b5('bum): ldan 'das de dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// thugs su chung de// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la bai/ shA ra dadwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu
278b6('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu me gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di 'bri zhing klog pa dang / ston cing kha ngon du byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing sgrim pa de dag ni/ shar phyogs dang / lde phyogs
278b7('bum): dang nub phyogs dang / drang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lde'i phyogs mtshams dang / lde rub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyis
278b8('bum): kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med/ grangs med pa de dag gis mkhyen to// sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs shing thugs su chud ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
279a1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed bu dang / bsgom pa dang / de bzhin nyid
279a2('bum): du nan tan dred pa de dag gis kyang / 'di ltar bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur te zhes bya bar rig par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
279a3('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bris shing glegs bam du byas te 'changab de dag kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di la mos pa mang bar gyur/ de dag
279a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / kha dan mang nges/ rim grer byed do// de ltar rigs
279a5('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bris shing 'chang ba de dag kyang don che ba dang / legs pa che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / rnam par smin pa che bar
279a6('bum): gyur to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ phyir mi ldog pa yongs su non gyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// nam yang sangs rgyas ba
279a7('bum): ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi
279a8('bum): bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// bzod pa'i pha rol
279b1('bum): tu phyin pa dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// 
279b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// nang stong pa nyid dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// bri stong pa nyid dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// phyi nang stong pa nyid da
279b3('bum): nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// chen po stong pa nyid dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// don dam pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang
279b4('bum): 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// mtha' las 'das pa
279b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// dor nga med pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang
279b6('bum): 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rang bzhin steng pa nyid dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
279b7('bum): dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// mi darigs pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ngo bo nyid stong pa
279b8('bum): dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ ya
280a1('bum): par spong ba rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mo 'gyur ro// dbang po rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur
280a2('bum): stobs rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ 
280a3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mo 'gyur ro// bsam gtan rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// tshad med pa rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// gzugs
280a4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thar pa brgyad dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa
280a5('bum): dgu dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rnam par thar pa'i ske stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smin pa med pa dang nar yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// mngon par shes
280a6('bum): pa rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
280a7('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// byams la chen po dang
280a8('bum): nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// snying rje chen po dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyang dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu
280b1('bum): phyin pa 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'das nas/ lde phyogs kyi rgyud ra spyod par 'gyur te/ de na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen pa dag ces
280b2('bum): padam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'bri bar 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/ 
280b3('bum): me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang pos rim gror byed/ bkur bstir byed/ bu dung du byung / mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// de dag
280b4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba des/ nam yang ngan seng leg par ltung bar mi' dong ste/ de dag gis lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myeng zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug gos/ mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro// 
280b5('bum): de dag pa rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis/ mngon par 'pha gas par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam sa la rim gre dang / bkur bsti dang / pu dang dang / mched par byed
280b6('bum): cing nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// 
280b7('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di/ lho phyogs kyi rgyud nas yul wa ra na sor na spyod par 'gyur te/ de na yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong dang / dge sa
280b8('bum): mdang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma ngag nges pa dam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'bri bar 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun dung par byed par 'gyur
281a1('bum): / tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan ma pas rim grer byed/ bkur
281a2('bum): bstir byed/ pubu dung du byed/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar mi 'dong ste/ de dag gis lnga dang mi yi phun sum rogs pa myedang zhing // pa rol
281a3('bum): tuphyin pa drug gis/ mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro// de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis/ mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gre dang
281a4('bum): bkur bsti dang / pu dang dang / mchod par byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa
281a5('bum): gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za ba me 'di/ yul wa ra na sir ni nas/ byang phyogs kyi rgyud ra
281a6('bum): sbed par 'gyur te/ de na yang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dag mos pa dam pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di/ 
281a7('bum): 'dri bar 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed par 'gyur te/ me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug
281a8('bum): pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba den mang pos/ rim grer byed/ bkur bstir byed/ pu dud du byed/ mchod par byed par 'gyur te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa
281b1('bum): des nam yang ngan seng leg par ltung bar mi 'dong ste/ de dag gis lnga dang / mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myed zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro// de dag pha rol
281b2('bum): tu byin pa drug po de dag gis/ mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gre dang / bkur bsti dang / pu dung dang / mchod par byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa
281b3('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ theg pa gsum pos rim gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ta'i bu
281b4('bum): de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po 'di lAHgas kyi rgyud dang / byang phyogs kyi rgyud na/ phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ lA rgya tha ma la sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed par 'gyur
281b5('bum): ro/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgengs pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang
281b6('bum): yin pa de ri/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos dang 'dul ba dang la bab pa'i tshe/ dam pa'i ches nub par mi 'gyur te/ ches de yang gang zher/ 'di lta ste/ shes
281b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kur chub par byed
281b8('bum): pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag la ni ngas dgongs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
282a1('bum): zab me 'di 'bri zhing bris nas kyang / me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / drug pa dang / khyi ma dang / na bza' dang / bdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan mang bas
282a2('bum): ring grer byed/ bkur bstir byed/ bu dung du byed/ mchong bar byed pa de dag kyang ngas dgongs te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me de dag ri/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des nam yang ngar seng log
282a3('bum): par ltung bar mi 'dong ste/ de dag lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pamyong zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis/ mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro// de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis/ 
282a4('bum): mngon par 'phags par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom lnga na 'das rnams la rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / du dung dang / mched par byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ 8
282a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'am/ theg pa gsum pas rim gyis mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe/ 
282a6('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bur de dag ni/ de bzhin
282a7('bum): gshegs pas brjod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas bstod do// bsngags so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me de dag ni
282a8('bum): shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
282b1('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis
282b2('bum): brjed de// bsted de// bsngags so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag gi lde phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyeng ba dang / 
282b3('bum): ches ster pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag
282b4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjed de// bstod do// bsngags so/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ nub phyogs kyi
282b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'di skyeng ba dang / ches ster ba 'di bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rjes
282b6('bum): ba'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / sangs rgyas kyi spun gyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
282b7('bum): ngag gis/ brjed de// bstod de/  cas rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyed
282b8('bum): dang ches sten pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / sangs rgyas kyi spun gyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo
283a1('bum): ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjed de// bsted de// bsngags so// rigs kyi bu dang/ rigs kyi bu me ngag mi
283a2('bum): shar gyi bregs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'di skye ba dang / ches sten pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
283a3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
283a4('bum): rgyas de dag gis brjed de// bsted do// bsngags so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ shar lde'i phyogs mtshan sa su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo/ 
283a5('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tshe skyeng ba dang / ches sten ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gcig
283a6('bum): so rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis brjod de// bsted de// bstag so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ 
283a7('bum): lho rung kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhug shing 'tsho skyeng ba dang / ches sten pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
283a8('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
283b1('bum): rgyas de dag gis brjod do// bsteng ngo // bsngags so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ nung byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
283b2('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tshong skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzig
283b3('bum): se rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / brjod do// bstod do// bsngags so// rigs kyi bu
283b4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis 'og gi phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba dang / chos sten pa'i de
283b5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs nga'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de
283b6('bum): dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/ brjod do// bstod do// bsngags so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ steng gi phyeg
283b7('bum): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
283b8('bum): sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs so// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis
284a1('bum): // brjod do// bsted de// bsngags so// gsel pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di/ slang ma'i dus slang ma'i chen/ byang phyogs su rgyas par 'gyur ro// bcom
284a2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/ byang phyogs su rgyas par gyur
284a3('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'gyur te/ thos nas kyang bris par 'gyur ro// 
284a4('bum): res par byas nas kyang / 'bri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'cha nga ba dang / klog pa dang / kun nub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / de bzhin du nar tar byed par 'a
284a5('bum): ro/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'a de nyan cing thes nas mes par byed pa dang / mes par
284a6('bum): byas nas/ 'bri zhing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chub par byed cing / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan du byed pa de dag ni/ yun ring po nas theg
284a7('bum): pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par rig par bya'o// gsel ba
284a8('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe na/ byang gi phyogs kyi cha der/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab ma/ 
284b1('bum): 'di nyan cing thos nas mos par bgyid pa dang / mos par bgyis nas/ 'bri zhing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang zhing klog pa dang / kun chung par bgyid cing / tshul bzhin du yid la bgying ba dang de bzhin nyid
284b2('bum): du nan tan du bgying pa de lta bu ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/ byang gi phyogs cha der/ byang chub sems dpa'i
284b3('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu ma ni mang du 'byung ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
284b4('bum): me 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ mi 'jum yongs su mi 'dzum/ mi 'jigs mi sdang / skrag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni mang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi
284b5('bum): bu me de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po'i rjes su 'brangs pa dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag
284b6('bum): gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang po la yongs su zhus/ yongs su dris pa'i phyir te/ de'ang ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu dang
284b7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
284b8('bum): par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
285a1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yengs su rdzogs
285a2('bum): par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ nang steng pa cing yongs su
285a3('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yengasu rdzogs
285a4('bum): par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni stong pa nyid steng pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ chen po steng pa
285a5('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ den dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu ma
285a6('bum): de dag ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu
285a7('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa steng pa nyid yongs su
285a8('bum): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid langs
285b1('bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ ches thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid
285b2('bum): steng pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ mi dmigs pa steng pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ 
285b3('bum): dngos po med pa steng pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni// ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de
285b4('bum): ngag ni dngos po med pa'i nga ba nyid stong pa nyid yengasu rdzogs par 'a gur re// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ dran pa nye bar gnag pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi
285b5('bum): bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ yang dag par spong ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa yengs
285b6('bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ dbang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur re// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ stobs
285b7('bum): sengs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag yengs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ 
285b8('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu
286a1('bum): dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ bsam gtan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gru
286a2('bum): re rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu de dag ni/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yengs
286a3('bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me
286a4('bum): de dag ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ mngon par shes pa
286a5('bum): yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/  gas kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ gzungs kyi skye yongs
286a6('bum): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni yi
286a7('bum): 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag
286a8('bum): byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyuraro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ snying rje chen po yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi
286b1('bum): ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa bas nye bar brtan par 'gyur te/ bla na red pa yang dag par rdzogs
286b2('bum): ba'i byang chub kyi den du sme ba dang po'i der byed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu po de dag la rings rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid dang ldan
286b3('bum): nga'i gautam brjed de// 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba'i// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang / 
286b4('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam brjod de/ de dag tshe 'das nas kyang 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
286b5('bum): rab kyi den du spyod pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de dag gzhan la yang 'di lta ste/ bla ra re dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du rnam pa de lta bu nyid rjod par 'gyuro// shA ra dwa ti'i ba
286b6('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni mnyam par gnag par 'gyur te/ de dag ni bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bzlog par mi
286b7('bum): na sdig te la mos pa dang / sdig te'i spyod pa can/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spong ba gzhan gyis lta ci smos/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang
286b8('bum): rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di thos nas dga' zhing nyams bde ba rgya chen po skye bar 'gyur// 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi den du
287a1('bum): skye bo mang po yang dge ba'i chos la 'geng bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag gis ni nga'i dun du 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang
287a2('bum): chung sems dpa'i smad pa sbed pa'i tshe/ sreg chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / sreg chags brgya stong phrag mang de/ byang chub tu rab tu dged par bgyi'o// yang
287a3('bum): dag par bstan par bgyi'o// yang dag par bskul bar bgyi'o// yang dag par gzeng bsted par bgyi'o// yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o// phyir mi ldeg par lung bstan par bgyi'o// 
287a4('bum): zhes bya ba'i tshig smras so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi cha ni sems la sems kyis rnam par bltas te/ ngas rjes su dgye
287a5('bum): par mdzad de// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar yang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu
287a6('bum): me de dag gis 'di skad du/ bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sreg chags brgya phrag mang po dang / sreg chags stong phrag mang po dang / sreg chags brgya stong phrag mang
287a7('bum): po/ byang chub tu dged par bgyi'o// yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o// yang dag par bskul bar bgyi'o// yang dag par gzengs bstod par bgyi'o// yang dag par dga' bar bgyi'o// phyir
287a8('bum): mi ldog par lung bstan par bgyi'o// zhes bya ba'i tshig smras so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams deng
287b1('bum): gis kyang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag gi tshig dang / sems la thug gis rnam par gzigs te/ rjes su dgyes par mdzad de// shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
287b2('bum): kyi bu me de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sreg chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / sreg chags brgya stong phrag mang po/ bla na med pa yang
287b3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rab tu 'ged par 'gyur ro// yang dag par sten par 'gyur ro// yang dag par bskul bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par gzengs bsted par 'gyur ro// yang
287b4('bum): dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro// ra mi ldog par lung ston par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu me de dag ni/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dra
287b5('bum): dang re dang / reg la mos pa rlabs po cher 'gyur te/ de dag sbyin pa rlabs po che gtong bar 'gyur ro// sbyin brlabs po che btang zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs
287b6('bum): bo che mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro// de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba rlabs po che mngon par 'du byas nas/ rnam par smin brlabs po che yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dag/ rnam par smir pa
287b7('bum): rlabs po che yongs su bzung nas/ sems can de dag nyid kyi den du rnam par smin pa rlabs be ri las/ dpas kyang rlabs be che ba'i rnam par smin pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ 
287b8('bum): 'di ltar phyi 'am/ nang gi dngos po de dag kyang / sems can de dag nyid la yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ de dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gang na/ de bzhin
288a1('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di nyid kyis nges
288a2('bum): sten pa mngon du gyur pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag la rten par 'gyur ro// de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams las/ shes
288a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di mngon sum du thos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu yang sreg chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog rags steng phrag mang po dang / sreg chags brgya steng
288a4('bum): phrag mang po/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro// yang dag par bskul bar 'gyur ro// yang dag par gzengs bstod par 'gyur ro// 
288a5('bum): yang dag par dga' bar byed par 'gyur ro// gsel ba/ ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po ya nga dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ 'das pa dang / 
288a6('bum): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams las/ ches gang thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma mchis so// de bzhin nyid dang chos nyid gang thugs su ma chud pa de lta bu gang yang ma
288a7('bum): mchis so// sems can rnams kyi sems thugs su ma chung ba de lta bu gang yang ma mchis pa ni nga mtshar che ste/ 'di ltar 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen te/ 
288a8('bum): 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen to// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen te/ me byed
288b1('bum): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang yengs su mkhyen te// mkhyen pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yengs
288b2('bum): su mkhyen te// da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / nyan thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen te// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs
288b3('bum): padagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tshetsho skyong ba dang / ches ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
288b4('bum): sangs rgyas de dag gi/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nga yongs su mkhyen te// sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / can thos rnams kyang yongs su mkhyen te// bcom ldan 'das gang yang
288b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ pha rol tu byin pa drug po 'di dag gi slad du brtson par bgyid cing / pha rol tu byin pa drug po 'di dag tshol ba dang / yongs su
288b6('bum): tshol po'i / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag tshol ba dang / yongs su tshol ba las/ la las ni btsal ba las pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag thob pa
288b7('bum): 'gyur/ la las ni theb par mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ta'i bu/ de ni de lta ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo brtson 'grus mi gtang ba de
288b8('bum): ngag kun gyis kyang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag pha rol
289a1('bum): byin ba drug po 'di dag gi don du brtson par byed pa'i phyir ro// gsal ga/ tsi lags/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi 'a dang/ rigs kyi bu me de dag gis ra
289a2('bum): zab me pha rol tu phyin pa drag dang ldan pa 'di dag kun kyang 'grub par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag gis mdo sde
289a3('bum): zab mo zab me pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di dag 'grub par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gnas med skabs med de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de ltar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
289a4('bum): ba'i byang chub tu sems can rnams yang dag par ston cing yang dag par bskul ba dang / yang dag par gzengs pa stong pa dang / yang dag par dga' bar byed pa dang / 'ged cing rab
289a5('bum): tu gzhog pa las kyang de bzhin du 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me tshe 'das nas kyang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag 'grub par 'gyur ro// de dag
289a6('bum): ni rang sangs rgyas kyi zhing / yongs su dag par ma byas/ sems can yongs su smin par ma byas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa
289a7('bum): ma gyur gyi bar du/ ji skad du bstan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag las/ brtson 'grus nyam par mi byed do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa steng
289a8('bum): drag brgya pa las/ le'u sum curtsa gcig pa'o// // / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
289b1('bum): ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spong ba/ sems can yongs su smin par
289b2('bum): bamid pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gi yon tan yongs su brjed pa ni 'di dag lags na/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
289b3('bum): pa'i byang chub tu sbed pa de dag la bar chad du 'gyur ba ji lta bu dag mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor spobs pa ha cang 'phyi ste skye na/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems
289b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa'i chen nges bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du slebs ba ha cang 'byi ste skye bar 'gyur/ de ci'i slad du/ byang chub
289b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su ri ga par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
289b6('bum): be shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par
289b7('bum): byed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dka'
289b8('bum): bar yongs su rdzogs par byed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dka' bar yongs su rdzogs par byed na/ rab 'byor rnam grangs nges shin tu 'phye ste spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ro// de ni byang chub
290a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang shin tu myur bar slengs pa skye na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
290a2('bum): chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shin tu myur bar spobs pa skye bar 'gyur ba de ni ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
290a3('bum): bad kyi las su rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed pa dang / tshul
290a4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pa rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
290a5('bum): la spong ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas ha cang myur bar spobs pa skye la des rlom sems su byed na/ rab 'byor rnam grangs
290a6('bum): des ni spobs pa ha cang myur bar skye ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang glal cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
290a7('bum): 'di 'bri na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang rgod cing 'bri na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems
290a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor phan tshun steg cing 'brin/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi lasu
290b1('bum): rig par bya'o// sems g.yeng zhing 'brin/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// yi ge gzhan la chags shing tshig gi ren mi shes par
290b2('bum): 'brin/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// 'di'i rim myong nas stan las langs te 'gren/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub
290b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang glal cing lung 'beg na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bas bdu
290b4('bum): kyi las su rig par bya'o// glal cing kha ten byed dam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ ston pa dang / glal cing tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor
290b5('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdu dkyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan ya dpan tshun dged cing 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam
290b6('bum): klog gam/ kun dub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/ 
290b7('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang phan tshun steg cing 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang
290b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang sems g.yeng bas 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog
291a1('bum): gam kun chub par byed dam/ tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen nges bdud
291a2('bum): kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gnan yang yi ge gzhan dang gzhan la chags shing 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ tshul
291a3('bum): bzhin du yid la byed na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsol pa dang / 
291a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'des kyis gang 'di skad du 'di'i ro ma myed ras stan las
291a5('bum): langs te 'gro na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig bar bya'o// zhes bka' stsal na/ bcom lda
291a6('bum): 'das ci'i slad du 'di'i ro mi myong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byer de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon
291a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu byin pa dang / tshul
291a8('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ma sprad pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
291b1('bum): nga 'di las bdag cag lung ma bstan te// zhes ma dad pa'i yid kyis bstan las langs shing 'deng ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
291b2('bum): bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las lung ma bstan par de dag stan las langs shing mchi
291b3('bum): bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'ang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyon med par ma chud pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
291b4('bum): byang chub tu lung mi bstan te/ de la bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las mi 'byung ngo // bdag gi ming yang yongs su ma brjod do// zhes
291b5('bum): rang bar ma gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan
291b6('bum): 'das ci'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi ming yongs su ma brjod pa lags
291b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa rnams kyi ming ni yongs su mi brjed de// de la bdag
291b8('bum): gi ming yang 'di las mi 'byung / bdag gang du skyes pa'i grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal gyi mo sa 'di las mi 'byung ngo // zhes de shes rab kyi pha rol
292a1('bum): phyin pa la mi mnyan to// snar byed cing 'khor de nas 'gro bar sems na/ sems bskyed pa des ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar sems shing
292a2('bum): gom pa ji snyed cig bor ba de snyed kyi bskal pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ de dag la bzod brtson par bya dgos so// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing mdo sde
292a3('bum): gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa de dag kun chub par bya bar sems te/ des na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / 
292a4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shing gi rtsa ba spangs te de nyid kyi yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma la 'ju bar sems par gyur
292a5('bum): bdag ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa
292a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa'i mdo sde kun chub par bgyi bar sems par 'gyur ba de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdo
292a7('bum): sde gang nyan thos dang ldan pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag ste/ 'di ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa
292a8('bum): bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
292b1('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / spen pa med pa rnams te/ de dag la gnas shing rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang / lan
292b2('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa dang / rang byang chub 'thob par 'gyur gyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
292b3('bum): ba'i byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor zhing kur du
292b4('bum): par bya bar sems pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su mi sgrub pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
292b5('bum): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni 'jig rten las 'ongs pa'i chos kyis 'bru nga bar 'gyur te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu
292b6('bum): phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la slob pa yin no// rab 'byor 'di
292b7('bum): lta ste dper na/ khyil la zhig/ jo bo'i zan nar ma bor te/ las mi las zan btsal bar sems pa dang 'dra bar/ de bzhin du rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang
292b8('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa 'di bor te/ 
293a1('bum): yal ga dang lo ma dang mdab ma lta bu'i mdo sde nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa dag la brtan par sems pa 'byung ste/ rab 'byer
293a2('bum): de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
293a3('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bor na/ khye dang bkur bsti'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde rnams
293a4('bum): kun chub par bya bar sems pa 'byung ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta
293a5('bum): ste dper na/ mi la la zhig glang po 'dod la/ des gla nga po rnyed na/ glang po'i rjes btsal bar sems pa yod na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
293a6('bum): skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ rab 'byor de
293a7('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing mdo sde gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de dag btsal bar
293a8('bum): sems pa de dag kyang dpe de dang 'dra bar rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di
293b1('bum): lnga ste dper na/ mi zhig rgya mtsho chen po blta bar 'dod la ba lang gi rjes btsal bar sems shing / nges pa lang gi rjes mthong nas kyang / 'di snyam du rgya mtshatshan
293b2('bum): de'i tshad 'di dang mnyam 'am/ mi mnyam snyam na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
293b3('bum): ni ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa da ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
293b4('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nya
293b5('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya bar sems pa de dag kyang / rnam pa de ltar rig par bya ste/ rab
293b6('bum): 'byer de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bya mkhan nam/ bya mkhan gyi
293b7('bum): slob ma rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad du khang pa zhig dbub cing bslang bar 'dod de/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang yongs su btsal bar sems shing nyi ma dang zla ba'i
293b8('bum): gzhal med khang las tshang blang bar sems na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu des nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang gi tshad kyis/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i
294a1('bum): tshad dang / dpe tshul bzung ste/ de dang 'dra ba'i khang ba dbub par nus sam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
294a2('bum): kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ bya mkhan nam bya mkhan gyi slob ma de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu de na
294a3('bum): byis pa'i ngang tshul can du rig par bgyi ste/ mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na
294a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
294a5('bum): phyin pa zab mo bor zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las/ rnam ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sem
294a6('bum): pa byung na/ rab 'byor de snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsel ba/ 
294a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byer de yang byang chub sems dpa'
294a8('bum): sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong bar 'dod la/ des khams
294b1('bum): kyi rgyal phran mthong nas 'di snyam du/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i kha dog dang dbyibs kyis ci 'dra ba zhig yod ces des khams kyi rgyal phran mthong ba'i kha dog dang / 
294b2('bum): dbyings kyi mtshan mar bzung bar bsams te/ 'di skad du 'khor les sgyur ba'i rgyal po de'i kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / tshul dang mtshan ma yang sa'i bdag po 'di dang 'dra ba
294b3('bum): zhig yong grang shes zer na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i nga tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bde bar
294b4('bum): gshegs pa de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ong sa pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
294b5('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dor zhing spangs
294b6('bum): te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du
294b7('bum): sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg de pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin dam/ gsel ba bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
294b8('bum): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
295a1('bum): 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu shin tu dkres pa la la zhig gis/ re brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas rnyed kyang drug cu pa'i kha zas btsal bar seras shing / 
295a2('bum): des kha zas re brgya dang ldan pa de per ras/ drug cu pa'i kha zas la bza' bar bsams na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu ri mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yid rang gsel
295a3('bum): pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chung sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / 
295a4('bum): rigs kyi bu mi de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di thos shing rnyed kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu blon de zad me ber zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang rang sa
295a5('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las/ rna pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung / rab 'byer de ji snyad du sems/ dang dung sems dpa'i
295a6('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
295a7('bum): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig gis derer bu rin po
295a8('bum): rin thang med pa rnyed nas/ nor bu mtshang bu dang bsgyur bar bsams na/ rab 'byer de ji snyam du sems/ skyes bu de mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin dam/ gsel ba/ bcom ldan 'das
295b1('bum): de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang
295b2('bum): la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos shing rnyed nas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo ngar zhing spangs te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
295b3('bum): sde dag las/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems pa 'byung na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu
295b4('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag mkhas pa'i ngang tshul can yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
295b5('bum): rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bes bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag
295b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'bri ba'i tshe/ spobs pa mang po gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di khri li krugs mar 'gyur ba de lta bu skye bar 'gyur ba la
295b7('bum): ltar gzugs kyi slebs pa dang / sgra'i slebs pa dang / dri'i spobs pa dang / re'i spobs pa dang / reg gi slebs pa dang / ches kyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i spobs pa dang / tshul
295b8('bum): khrims kyi slebs pa dang / bzeng po'i slebs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi spobs pa dang / shes rab kyi slebs pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams
296a1('bum): slebs pa dang / gzugs kyi khams kyi spobs pa dang / gzugs reng ba'i khams kyi spobs pa dang / lung 'jig pa dang / khater du bya ba'i spongs pa
296a2('bum): dang rir grer bya ba'i spobs pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i spobs pa dang / yang dag par spong ba'i spobs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i spobs pa dang / dbang po'i slebs pa dang / 
296a3('bum): stebs kyi spobs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi spobs pa dang / lam gyi spobs pa dang / bsam gtan gyi spobs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i spobs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi
296a4('bum): spongs pa dang / snyems par 'jug pa'i spobs pa dang / nang steng pa nyid kyi spangs pa dang / phyi steng pa nyid kyi sdeb sang dang / byi nang steng pa nyid kyi spobs dang / steng pa nyid
296a5('bum): steng pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / chen po steng pa nyid kyi sna bas pa dang / den dam pa steng ba nyid kyi spongs pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi spongs pa dang / 'dus ma byas
296a6('bum): steng pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / mtha' las 'das ste nyid kyi spobs pa dang / rdeg ma dang tha ma med pa steng pa nyid kyi spongs pa dang / der ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang
296a7('bum): rang bzhin steng pa nyid kyi slebs pa dang / ches thams cad steng pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / mi dmigs pa steng pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang
296a8('bum): dngos po med pa steng pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi spangs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid kyi spobs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i
296b1('bum): slebs pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / bsam
296b2('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spongs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spobs pa dang / stobs bcu'i spobs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i spobs pa dang / so so
296b3('bum): yang dag par rig pa'i spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa'i spobs pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i spobs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
296b4('bum): bu'i spobs pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i sprob sa pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i spobs pa dang / rang byang chub kyi spobs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
296b5('bum): ba'i byang chub kyi sbrebs pa skye bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ rab 'byer shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ spobs pa med pas rnam par byang ba'o// rab 'byor shes
296b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems med pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ skye ba med cing 'gag
296b7('bum): pa med pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'khrugs pa med pa
296b8('bum): rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brjod du med pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam par byang ba me pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
297a1('bum): dmigs pa med ba'o// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ches de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab po 'di la med cing ming rigs te/ rab 'byor gul te bya
297a2('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di 'bri ba'i tshe/ ches de dag gis 'khrugs par gyur na/ rab 'byor de yang dang
297a3('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu me de dag gis bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// de skad ces stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das
297a4('bum): la 'di skad ces gsel to// bcom ldan 'das shes ra da kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri bar nus sam/ bcom ldan 'angs kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta ma yin no// 
297a5('bum): rab 'byor ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu na nga'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yeng bar
297a6('bum): yin te mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod bar yin te ri dmigs so// 
297a7('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// nang steng pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa
297a8('bum): ma yin te mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dari gos so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid
297b1('bum): yed pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// den dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// 'dus byas
297b2('bum): steng pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa
297b3('bum): ma yin te mi dmigs so// theg ma dang tha na med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// der ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// 
297b4('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo rta da yeng nga ma yin te mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid
297b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi ngo nga nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo ba nyid yod pa ma yi na te mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi nga
297b6('bum): med pa ma yin/ ming tshogs so// ngo bo cing steng pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid kyi ngo ba nyid yong ba ma yin te ri
297b7('bum): dmigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ngo ba cing yongad pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi
297b8('bum): rkang pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// dbang po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// stongs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yeng ba ma yin te mi dmigs/ 
298a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi darigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ngo bo nyid yeng ba ma yin te mi ngarigs
298a2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// bsam gtan rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// tshad med pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yeng ba ma
298a3('bum): yin te mi dmigs so// gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yeng pa ma yin te mi darigs so// 
298a4('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ngo be nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// rnam par thar pa 'i sgo steng pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
298a5('bum): ba'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmig so// ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te/ 
298a6('bum): ri dngogs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so/ mi 'jigs
298a7('bum): nga rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// byams pa chen po'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin
298a8('bum): te mi dmig so// snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// thams cad shes pa
298b1('bum): nyid kyi ngo ba cid yeng ba ma yin te mi dmigs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa cid kyi ngo ba yid yod pa ma yin te mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid yong bar
298b2('bum): yin te mi dmigs so// de bo nyid mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ dngos po med pas dngos po red
298b3('bum): pa bri bar mi nus so// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dngos po med ces bya bar 'dra
298b4('bum): shes na/ de yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gso la pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
298b5('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bros nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa zab mo 'di bdag gis bris so// zhes mching de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab me 'di la yi
298b6('bum): mngon par chags pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// brtson 'grus
298b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// bzong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
298b8('bum): ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugasami ge pa mchis pa'o// tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'du shes ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ 
299a1('bum): rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mig ni laM ge ma mchis pa'o// nga ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sman yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lA ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o/ 
299a2('bum): lus ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// yid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sgra ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// dri ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// ro ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 
299a3('bum): reg ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// chos ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sna'i rnam par
299a4('bum): shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yi ge
299a5('bum): ma mchis pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchi sa pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 
299a6('bum): lce'i 'das te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ger mchis pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
299a7('bum): gyis tshe ra ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 
299a8('bum): lce'i 'das te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshe rab ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni yi ge ra mchis pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni
299b1('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sa'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// chu'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// me'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rlung gi khams ni yi ge ma mchis
299b2('bum): ba'i nam mkha'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// ma rig pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'du byed ni yi ge ma mchis pa
299b3('bum): rnam par shes pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// ming dang gzugs ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// skye mched drug ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// reg pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// tshor ba ri ya
299b4('bum): ge ma mchis pa'o// sred pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'i/ len pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// srid pa ni yi ge ra mchis pa'o// skye ba ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rga
299b5('bum): yi ge ma mchis pa'o// nang stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchi sa pa'o// phyi steng pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// phy-ir/ nga steng pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// stong pa nyid steng
299b6('bum): shing ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// do dpa pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'dus byas steng ba nyid ni yi ge pa mchis pa'o// 
299b7('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa steng pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// theg ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ri yi ge ma mchis pa'o// der
299b8('bum): med pa stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid steng ba
300a1('bum): nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mi dmigs pa steng pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// dngos po med nga stong pa nyid ni yi ge ma pa nges pa'o// ngo bo nyid steng ba nyid ni
300a2('bum): yi ge pa mchis pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni yi ge pa mchis pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnams ri yi
300a3('bum): ge ra mchis pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// dbang de rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// stengs rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag
300a4('bum): rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam ya na lag brgyad pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni yi ge ra mchis pa'o// bsapa
300a5('bum): gtan rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// tshad red pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// rnam
300a6('bum): par thar pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i sdom par 'jug pa rnams ni yi ger mchis pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan pa red pa dang / sped
300a7('bum): nga med pa ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni yi ge ra mchis pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ri yi ge ra mchis pa'o/ 
300a8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// mi 'jigs pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// 
300b1('bum): byams pa chen po ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// snying rje chen po ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa rnams ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// thams cad shes pa nyid ni yi ge ma
300b2('bum): mchis pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni yi ge ra mchis pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni yi ge ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa'i
300b3('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo yi ge ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid la/ yi ge pa mchis pa'i bas
300b4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / 
300b5('bum): yi ge pa mchis pa'i bzeng ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mdze na par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par
300b6('bum): bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mangs pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i nang steng pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i
300b7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par dgas par bgyid pa dang / yi ge pa mchis pa'i phyi nang steng pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i steng pa nyid steng pa nyid la bder par rag
300b8('bum): par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ma pa ris pa'i chen po steng pa nyid la mngon par dgas par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ra 'chis pa'i der dam pa stong pa nyid la ngon par dgas par bgying ba dang / yi ge ma mchis pa'i
301a1('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyi pa dang / yi ge ra mchis pa'i 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgying pa dang / yi ge rar ches pa'i
301a2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa steng pa nyid la rangen par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ra mchis pa'i theg ma dang tha ma dang steng pa nyid la mngon par chags par bgyid pa dang / yi ge ra mchis pa'i
